verbose_text: Binding of the extracellular domain of Notch receptor to Notch ligand on neighbouring cells initiates sequential two step proteolytic cleavage of Notch by extracellular ADAM (metalloprotease) protease and gamma - secretase complex respectively, then releases Notch intracellular domain (NICD) XREF_BIBR.
evidence: Notch receptor to Notch ligand on neighbouring cells initiates sequential two step proteolytic cleavage of Notch by extracellular ADAM (metalloprotease) protease
